greeting: Hello! Welcome to Grand Hotel Bot. I can help you with room bookings, hotel info, and services. How may I assist you today?
goodbye: Thank you for chatting with us. We hope to see you soon at Grand Hotel! Have a wonderful day.
ask_room_price: Our rates per night are: Standard Room (RM150), Family Room (RM250), and Executive Suite (RM300). Prices may vary by season. Please check our website for real-time rates.
ask_availability: We usually have rooms available for most dates. You can check real-time availability and vacant dates directly on our official website: www.grandhotel.com.my
ask_facilities: Yes! We offer Free Parking and Laundry Service. Rooms have AC, mini-fridge, loker, and hairdryer. Facilities include free WiFi, an outdoor pool (Level 3), a 24/7 gym, and an on-site restaurant.
ask_location: We are at 18 Jalan Alor, KL City Center. We are 5 mins walk from the MRT station.
ask_checkin_time: Check-in starts at 3:00 PM. Early check-in is subject to availability. You can drop your luggage at the concierge for free if you arrive early. Please note that a security deposit is required upon check-in, which will be refunded upon check-out.
ask_checkout_time: Check-out is by 12:00 PM. Late check-out until 2:00 PM costs RM50 (subject to availability). Simply drop your key card at the desk when leaving.
ask_booking: For reservations, please visit our website at www.grandhotel.com.my, call our Reservation Department at +603-5555-0199, or visit our hotel in person for manual booking. We require a valid ID for all bookings.
ask_cancellation: Free cancellation is available up to 24 hours before check-in. Cancellations within 24 hours (or no-shows) are charged the first night's rate.
ask_contact_support: For urgent matters, please call the Front Desk at +60-3-5555-0199. For complaints or other inquiries, please email us at support@grandhotel.com.
ask_payment_methods: We accept Cash (MYR), Credit Cards (Visa/Master/Amex), and E-wallets (GrabPay/TnG). A refundable security deposit of RM100 is required upon check-in.
ask_pet_policy: We are Pet-Friendly! Dogs/cats <10kg are welcome (fee: RM50/stay). Service animals stay free. Please note: Pets are not allowed in the restaurant or pool area.
ask_smoking_policy: All guest rooms are strictly Non-Smoking (RM500 fine applies). Smoking is ONLY allowed in the designated area outside the main lobby entrance.
ask_luggage_storage: Yes! We offer free, secure luggage storage 24/7. You can leave your bags with us before check-in or after check-out while you explore the city.
ask_child_policy: Kids <12 stay free (existing bedding). Baby cots and high chairs are provided free on request. We do NOT offer babysitting services, but have a kids' play corner in the lobby.
ask_breakfast_details: Buffet breakfast (Halal) is 6:30-10:30 AM at the Garden Cafe. Price: RM35/adult. We offer Nasi Lemak, Western, and Vegan options. In-room breakfast is also available.
ask_airport_transfer: We offer a private limo (RM80) or van (RM120). Please book 24h in advance at the Front Desk. Alternatively, Grab cars are easily available (~RM65 to KLIA).
ask_nearby_attractions: Top spots nearby: KLCC Twin Towers (1km), Pavilion Mall (Shopping), National Museum (Culture), and Jalan Alor (Street Food). The concierge desk has free city maps.
ask_lost_item: Please visit the Front Desk immediately to report lost items. Our security team will check the Lost & Found log and assist you in locating your belongings.
